author: Special Correspondent
text: A seminar on inclusion – challenges and solutions on disability was held at Dr. MGR Special School for Hearing Impaired at Ramapuram on Sunday. Himanshu Dass, director, National Institute for Persons with Multiple Disabilities (NIPMED), Muttukadu, inaugurated the seminar. The seminar was held as part of the 99{+t}{+h}birth anniversary celebrations of former Chief Minister M.G.Ramachandran. T.A.P. Varadakutti and K.Gopinath, president and general secretary of Tamil Nadu Udavikkaram Association for the Welfare of Differently Abled were present.
title: Seminar held
